name: vxMicroBrowser

screenshots.caption: Rocky Start ... first TextBox and ScrollBar controls

short_description: MicroBrowser implementation for VxWorks OS. The main goal is to support WML 1.3, XHTML MP 2.0 and a subset of DHTML. Graphical UI based on NanoX/MicroWindows and GTK 1.2 toolkit.
